body_html: @mrry I was expecting to find something like a tensorflow_std_server BUILD rule but can't. Do we not currently supply any build rule for a standalone TF server? Should we add a general build rule, and specialize it for XRT, rather than just building this bespoke XRT server?
body_text: @mrry I was expecting to find something like a tensorflow_std_server BUILD rule but can't. Do we not currently supply any build rule for a standalone TF server? Should we add a general build rule, and specialize it for XRT, rather than just building this bespoke XRT server?
body: @mrry I was expecting to find something like a tensorflow_std_server BUILD rule but can't. Do we not currently supply any build rule for a standalone TF server? Should we add a general build rule, and specialize it for XRT, rather than just building this bespoke XRT server?
